Class Polynomial

  • java.lang.Object
    • Polynomial

  • public class Polynomial
extends java.lang.Object
    Polynomial class Degree = Can only be Positive Integer Coefficient = Can be any Real number

      • addition

        public Polynomial addition(Polynomial p)
        Addition operation between 2 Polynomial equations
        Parameters:
        p - Second Polynomial to be added to current Polynomial
        Returns:
        New Polynomial containing sum of the 2 given Polynomials Example p1.addition(p2) => p1 + p2

      • subtraction

        public Polynomial subtraction(Polynomial p)
        Subtraction operation between 2 Polynomial equations
        Parameters:
        p - Second Polynomial to be subtracted from current Polynomial
        Returns:
        New Polynomial containing difference of the 2 given Polynomials Example: p1.subtraction(p2) => p1 - p2

      • multiply

        public Polynomial multiply(Polynomial p)
        Multiplication operation between 2 Polynomial equations
        Parameters:
        p - Second Polynomial to be multiplied to current Polynomial
        Returns:
        New Polynomial formed from multiplication of the 2 given Polynomials Example: p1.multiply(p2) => p1 * p2
